attributes.action: Stop implementation of LGBTIQ and non gender policies.
attributes.additional_details: LGBTIQ etc. and non-gender politics are now very visible and constantly being pushed to the fore of MP's thoughts and actions. However, many people of an older generation and millennials agree that being a lesbian/gay/non-binary is a personal choice which is acceptable. The key issue is when all schoolchildren are requested to wear a non gender uniform to make a few transgender children feel happier, included. Are schools taking into account other children's feelings, the parents etc?
attributes.background:
Our society is more than ever being driven by minorities. 

It is hoped traditional, conservative values will be promoted & supported removing same sex education, paraphernalia and non-gender discussions, films, programmes from public view until at least after 9pm on T.V. and other commumications.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
